tool.name: SAGA.shapes_points.10
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayINPUT False isArrayPOLYGONS False isArrayFIELDS False output_data_OUTPUT $output_data_OUTPUT name SAGA.shapes_points.10 INPUT $INPUT POLYGONS $POLYGONS FIELDS $FIELDS prefer $prefer response $response outputType_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.outputType_OUTPUT transmissionMode_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.transmissionMode_OUTPUT

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Points
param.help: Points The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: POLYGONS
param.label: Polygons
param.help: Polygons The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: FIELDS
param.label: Attributes
param.help: Attributes to add. Select none to add all The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Spatial join for points. Retrieves for each point the selected attributes from those polygon, which contain the point.
